summary: three Videos of the Sword are linked in the Description.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Mithrodin Sword
Date: 26.08.12
Category: Weapons
Author: BlutKult

-------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xrlo6bl.png[/img][/center]



-------------------
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]
------------------

The Sword comes in one-handed and two-handed version.
requires steel smithing, silver ingots and leather strips.


------------------------
[color=yellow][b]Sword names:[/b][/color]
------------------------

- Mithrodin I (one-handed)
- Mithrodin II (two-handed)


---------------
[color=yellow][b]Changelog:[/b][/color]
----------------

V.2.0
sheath for 2H Sword added


----------------
[color=yellow][b]Credits:[/b][/color]
----------------

Kit Rae for the awesome Sword Design!

thank you [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1674320]Maevan2[/url] for the screenshots!
thanks to Just_Crazy for the Russian Translation on [url=http://modgames.net/load/248-1-0-13577]modgames.net
[/url]also many thanks to Spartanwolf67, who've made the Sword available for the xbox one on [url=https://bethesda.net/de/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/4018547]Bethesda.net[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6247421/?]dptheslothking[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D64647%26preview%3D&pUp=1]A Lot of Dual Sheath Redux Patches[/url] Mod,
which supports the Mithrodin Sword and also my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10784/?]Dwarven Axes[/url]



----------------
[color=yellow][b]Videos:[/b][/color]
----------------
